entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 24 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023
